title: Calogero-Vasiliev Oscillator in Dynamically Evolving Curved Spacetime
abstract:
In a recent work, the consequences of quantizing a real scalar field $\Phi$ according to generalized ``quon'' statistics in a dynamically evolving curved spacetime (~which, prior to some initial time and subsequent to some later time, is flat~) were considered. Here a similar calculation is performed; this time we quantize $\Phi$ via the Calogero-Vasiliev oscillator algebra, described by a real parameter $
u > -1/2$. It is found that both conservation ( $
